hints.content: Which of the shapes also has $4$ equal sides?

This shape belongs in the group:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 9 meters. The corners of the shape are not right angles. !

question.content:
The following shapes all belong to the same group.

 | | 
- | - | -
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 7 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/93514dfe54d3cb4511c309007fda5b67212fb88a) | ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 8 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7f0e5540e40971727b10085f0bbaa16df59afac5) | ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 9 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2defbee52d2fa05f34fd0bdddaf4758076e9e50a)

All of the shapes have $4$ equal sides.

**Which of the following shapes belongs in the group?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A six-sided shape. Each side is labeled 10 meters. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/986ff702bae5e398c1d6c707f8b9792cd2169e0c)
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 9 meters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3c0d569a48e71e47eb96761e10d58dc8fe25e74f)
![A five-sided shape. Each side is labeled 12 centimeters. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/96e99abd9dff575777a47432ca0bd0746e7f5909)

![A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 7 centimeters, the bottom side is labeled 10 centimeters, the left side is labeled 8 centimeters, and the right side is labeled 8 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/e690ac7ca8d62cc2d28b592a523edd468b767d14)
